Replace.Text: Takeaki
Emperor of the Zhou Dynasty
Tang
Tang Dynasty
God bless all nations

Unlocks "Irrigation" at the start of the game. Farms and Plantations gain +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture and can trigger Culture Bombs. [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Works gain 300% [Icon_Tourism] Tourism. [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] gives +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture and +5 [ICON_Production] Production per additional Great Work. Shrines, Libraries, and Universities gain additional [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Great Work slots. +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture per Envoy, +15% [ICON_Culture] Culture and 5% [ICON_Gold] per City-State Suzerain.
Add 5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength, and gain [ICON_GreatGeneral] great general points and [ICON_GreatWriter] great writer points after killing a unit

+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength for all units. After killing a unit, you will gain [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points and [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points. You will also gain [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Gold] Gold equal to 50% of the [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength of the killed unit. This value will be doubled after entering the [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. For each [ICON_GreatPerson] you recruit, you will randomly gain 1 [ICON_TechBoosted] Eureka Moment, and +4% for [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Science].
Dali Temple

A Tang Dynasty specialty area that is responsible for the trial of criminal cases. It is unlocked earlier and cheaper to build. It replaces the Municipal Square. It has a large amount of bonuses when compared to the district. Gives the city a small trade bonus. Provides 2 [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer points and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points. After construction, it gains an additional [ICON_Governor] Governor title and merchant units.
Black Armor Army

A unique unit of the Tang Dynasty in the Middle Ages, replacing the Knight. It has higher mobility and attack power, and the unit's field of view is increased by 1. It has one free upgrade at the beginning. After killing the unit, you will get [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General Points.
Battle-hardened
Initially has one free upgrade. After killing a unit, you will get [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points and [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General Points.
I am Wu Mingkong, the chosen one
Interesting, it depends on your ability.
People like you have to be dealt a heavy blow.
That’s great, that’s why I like you the most.
Do you think I am plotting against you? But I am indeed plotting against you!
What am I working so hard for?
It's really wonderful.
I am the chosen one, different from you.
I want to get to know you better.
Friendship is the ladder to our ambitions.
That's all.
Lift the curfew at night so that everyone can come out and have fun together!
Oh... maybe we could talk about it in the Han Dynasty, but forget it now.
I have sent you some jade horses, dancers from the Great Zhou, and, as always, the finest silks.
You have really become more capable.
Fork out. (Condemn you)
Our capital is built on a mountain of history, and every speck of it is filled with art. Would you like to see it?
snort.
All roads lead to the Great Zhou.
Musician, don't stop.
Be close to your friends, but be closer - I mean, stay close to your friends.
The way of dying with a wail of a demon is really too inelegant.
You want to stop my rise on the world stage? No way.
This war is no longer inspiring.
We are open and honest.
No. Taboo also represents mystery, doesn't it?
Let us measure the area of ​​each other's land so that we can have a deeper understanding.
Your visit was really... unsubtle.
mean.
My vision cannot be wrong.
